[explanation] By solving for the steady state proabilities, one should arrive at the follwoing system of equations: \(p1=\frac{p+d}{q}p2\) \(p3=\frac{p}{rq}(p+d+q)p2\) \(p4=\frac{d}{m}p2\) \(\frac{p+d}{q}p2+\frac{p}{rq}(p+d+q)p2+\frac{d}{m}p2+p2=1\) To attain the steady state probabilities, solve the system above.
